title: Performance-Centered Project-Based Mathematical Problem-Solving Process

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of college-level foundational mathematics (calculus, linear algebra)
context.additional_context: Collaborative learning environment using digital devices, with a formative assessment-driven continuous feedback system

learning_goals: Learners transform real-world industrial problems into mathematical models and develop solution strategies
Learners improve the validity of project deliverables through peer assessment by over 80%
Learners achieve a score of 75 or higher in mathematical communication skills during weekly performance presentations
Learners produce data analysis and visualization outputs using digital tools four or more times
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
